item.title: Happy Birthday Revive
item.dc:creator: revive

Continue reading "Happy Birthday Revive"
item.content:encoded:
Revive is celebrating its first official year in Kirkstall today. We are proud to share some statistics with you, our customers, regarding the work we do. In a year, it is estimated that we have sold 30,000 items of clothing, 49,000 books and 100,000 of Bric-à-brac items.

Based on statistics from the Furniture Re-use Network, an organisation that oversees re-use businesses; the impact on our local community is that 3,500 households have saved an estimated half a million pounds y reusing rather than buying new.

It is also estimated that we have diverted a quarter of a million kilograms worth of items from landfill.

We at Revive would like to thank our customers; as none of this would have been possible without them.
